tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Examinations,Surgical Tooth Extraction,
review:
I had a painful gum and moving tooth in my lower right jaw for which I consulted Dr. Arimeeta Bhadra and Dr. Sanket Chakraverty at Teeth Care Chinar Park in Rajarhat, New Town.
Dr. Arimeeta checked my Teeth on the first day and recommended the line of treatment. My affected tooth was duly extracted the next day and measurements taken for cantilever dental bridge.
Subsequently, Dr. Sanket checked my teeth, made adjustments to the nearby teeth for the bridge to be implanted later, and suggested that I go for a bridge made of DMLS material for stability and longevity.
The bridge was finally implanted yesterday and has been stable so far. 
Throughout this process that lasted over a couple of weeks, I did not feel any discomfort at any time and was kept informed about the treatment plan and next steps at all times.
reply_text: Thank you sir üôè. Your support and Kind words really means a lot.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I didn't get my queries answered properly.  Instead of the doctor his assistant gave the answers and that too after asking. He should make us understand everything properly before starting the treatment
reply_text:
Respected Sir, 

           first of all when you are posting your feedback, please at-least mention your name. 

Secondly, In our setup, once you have consulted the  doctor then only you are sent to the assistant for discussing the treatment duration and cost. There again the assistant will help you to understand the treatment plan given by doctor and if you had any doubt then you could have asked the doctor to clarify. Especially for cosmetic dental treatment , there are so many options available, it‚Äôs difficult to understand and even explain in 15 minutes time for consultation given by Practo. 

There would have been other patients waiting in queue to get consultation and start the dental procedure plus we have other branches to maintain and we have to maintain timing for all the other patients who are booking via practo. If you wanted you could have chosen the duration of consultation as 30 minutes or 45 minutes and asked your queries.  Thank you üôè
